SEARCH
Package SnakeGame

Class Scoreboard

java.lang.Object
SnakeGame.Scoreboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHighscoresReader
public class Scoreboard extends Object implements IHighscoresReader
This class represents all of the scores set. This class is responsible for handling scores, having utility functions for writing and reading to and from files respectively.
See Also:
